games.name: Water Sorting Puzzle
games.description:
Water Sorting Puzzle is a fun and challenging water sort puzzle color game with a huge breakthrough in the gameplay of sorting puzzles. Sort liquid of various colors and pour the liquid into the cups according to the water color, so that each cup is filled with the same color.

The water color sort puzzle game interface is very simple and the sort operation is very easy, but it can greatly exercises your logical ability. With the increase of colors and cups, the difficulty of water connect puzzl

games.name: Tropical Merge
games.description: Tropical Merge welcomes you! Prepare for a family farm adventure filled with mystery and unique characters! Grow your tropical garden to help locals save their paradise!

games.name: The Mergest Kingdom
games.description: A lot of adventure awaits you in Mergest Kingdom! Enter this enchanted kingdom and defend it from the dark forces!

games.name: Mahjong Connect Deluxe
games.description: The Deluxe Edition of the classic game enjoyed by millions! You must connect the mahjong pieces and clear the board in Mahjong Connect! Collect coins to use in the newly added shop and buy new background and tiles!

games.name: Jelly Cubes
games.description: Pick and drop sets of jelly cubes on the board.  You can rotate the block sets by clicking on it. Put three of the same color together to make points and remove jellies.  You're not limited by time, only by empty space on the board so make your moves carefully. Make bigger groups of matches to get more points.

games.name: Jelly Crush
games.description: Match cute jellies to achieve goal! If you are in the mood for an amazingly delicious jelly puzzle, Jelly Crush is the exact right sweet course for you. Keep swapping the jellies around as you crush and squish them!ng the jellies around as you crush and squish them!

games.name: Slip Blocks
games.description: Slip Blocks is a fun puzzle game to play! You are a cube of a certain color, and you can only move along routes that include dots of that color! Have fun!

games.name: Winter Bubbles
games.description: Winter Bubbles is a winter-themed version of the classic bubble shooter game. Aim and release the candle to mix it with other candles of the same kind! Make sure the candles don't go too close to the border!

games.name: Jewel Christmas Mania
games.description: Try your luck at this Christmas-themed puzzle game. Enjoy the snowmen, cookies, and Christmas balls in this festive journey! To remove three Christmas objects of the same shape, swap and match them!

games.name: Super Solitaire
games.description: Three of the most popular solitaire games are available to play! If you enjoy playing solitaire games, Super Solitaire is the game for you! Have fun!

games.name: Emoji Word Puzzle
games.description: Emoji Word Puzzle is a brand-new, funny, and addicting game! Solve emoji puzzles, predict the word coded in emojis and vice versa, and write the word with emojis!

games.name: Smarty Bubbles XMAS
games.description: It's the winter season! Smarty Bubbles, our excellent bubble shooter, now has a lovely wintery look. Can you beat your personal record by combining at least three bubbles of the same color?

games.name: Safe Circle Space
games.description: It's a basic game, but it's addicting! Save dot player in safe circle space. Tap the screen to adjust your direction of movement, dodge obstacles, and earn the highest score possible!

games.name: Aqua Blitz 2
games.description: Welcome to Aquablitz 2, the latest version of the popular underwater match-3 game, which features improved visuals, a catchy song, and a ton of new features! Play for free right now and take on plenty of addictive match-3 challenges!

games.name: Xmasjong
games.description: Find a pair of identical tiles and remove them from the board in Xmasjong! Complete all of the stages, collect all of the toys, and decorate the Christmas tree!

games.name: Catch The Snowflake
games.description: Prepare to get your attention challenged in Catch The Snowflake! The squares in this game are decorated with snowflakes and Christmas trees, and all you have to do is connect them. How many points do you think you'll be able to score before the clock runs out?

games.name: Mystery Venue Hidden Object
games.description: Find hidden objects throughout a mysterious town! You must visit the site with caution since it is a deserted town that is dark and spooky. Are you up for the challenge of the Mystery Venue?

games.name: Paint House
games.description: Bring the colors in Paint House and paint everything in seconds! To finish each level, fill in all of the white spots. Fill all the empty areas by swiping left, right, up, and down! Are you ready to take on the challenge?

games.name: Pretty Tiles
games.description: To destroy three tiles of the same shape, tap on them. In Pretty Tiles, you'll be rewarded if you match three named tiles within the time limit!

games.name: Butterfly Kyodai
games.description: Connect the same butterflies in this fun connect-2 game Butterfly Kyodai.

games.name: Happy Connect
games.description: You must reorder the lines in this puzzle game to join them all. In Happy Connect you will pass the level if you make the correct connection! Have fun!

games.name: Match Adventure
games.description: Begin your amazing journey with Gemmy the squirrel in this colorful and fun match-3 game! Earn coins for building by completing the Match-3 levels!

games.name: Om Nom Connect Christmas
games.description: You must match the similar cute monsters or candies with each other to make them disappear from the board and let Om nom and his friends celebrate Christmas together! Have fun!

games.name: Winter Pairs
games.description: To collect both crafts, slide the beautiful Winter Crafts towards its matching one! Don't waste time and win the competition to match as many Crafts as possible with the fewest number of slides possible!

games.name: Harvest Honors
games.description: It's time to make your way down to this farm for a fun puzzle. In Harvest Honors Classic, how quickly can you match all of the carrots? Best of luck!

games.name: Onet Winter Christmas Mahjong
games.description: Onet Winter Christmas Mahjong is a lovely mahjong connect game that is both enjoyable and relaxing. Find pairs and remove all tiles from the board!

games.name: Home Makeover 2 Hidden Object
games.description: It's time for Home Makeover 2! It's much larger and better than before! Allow yourself to get taken away by a fascinating Hidden Object adventure narrative! Discover all of the fun ways to play!

games.name: Ducklings.io
games.description: It's time to wind down; you're now a duck! Float about and save as many ducklings as you can! Have fun!

games.name: Draw Blocks 3D
games.description: There are many squares in the game! Create cubes to fill up the spaces by drawing them. The block turns into cubes, and you advance to the next level. Time is running out to make the best decision!

games.name: Parking Escape
games.description: Parking Escape is a calm, challenging, and entertaining sliding puzzle game. Don't get too uptight over getting out of the parking lot. To achieve total zen, unblock the cars in these relaxing logic puzzles!

games.name: Who Was Who
games.description: Your mission is to match photos of a celebrity when he was younger! This thrilling game is not only for fans of celebrities, but also for people who want to test their skills as a face recognition expert! Have fun!

games.name: Holiday Mahjong Dimensions
games.description: Enjoy an entirely new set of levels with Christmas melodies and tiles with Christmas trees, Christmas lights, Christmas decorations, and more in Holiday Mahjong Dimensions!

games.name: Best Link
games.description: To clear cards, connect two matching cards with three or less straight lines; clear all match pairs to advance to the next round! Solve the puzzles to test your mind, and you'll find them simple and enjoyable!

games.name: Arkadium's Codeword
games.description: To add a letter and crack the code, click a cell and then type or click on the letter you want to enter in the cell. Good luck and have a good time!

games.name: Candies All The Way
games.description: To make a horizontal or vertical row of 3 or more similar candy, slide a row of candies horizontally or vertically! To slide the rows, use your mouse or your finger tip. Try to complete as many levels as you can in this timed game!

games.name: Xmas Triple Mahjong
games.description: A Christmas-themed triple mahjong game! Only three identical tiles can be eliminated. Let's see if you can get through all 18 levels! Best of luck!

games.name: Bubble Shooter Wheel
games.description: This is a unique bubble shooter game that features a rotating wheel of bubbles! Collect all of the bubbles on the wheel to complete the game. To make a group of at least three bubbles of the same color, shoot the bubble towards the wheel!

games.name: Winter Jewels Saga
games.description: Winter Jewel Saga is a match-3 game with 80 fun yet challenging levels online for free. Swap and match jewels in this jewel puzzle adventure to progress to the next level. Solve puzzles with quick thinking and smart moves. Plan your moves by matching 3 or more jewels in a row or col. Match four or more jewels to create power-ups.

games.name: Winter Mahjong
games.description: Winter Mahjong is a fun and exciting game of Mahjong with mistletoes and christmas presents! Use your skills, strategy and luck to complete the game! There are some handy features to help you complete the full game.

games.name: Solitaire Story Tripeaks 2
games.description: With its second version, your favorite solitaire game is back! Here are many hours of fun waiting to take you on a journey and solve some problems! Are you ready to collect stars and complete all of Solitaire Story TriPeaks 2's difficult levels?

games.name: Jigsaw Puzzle: 100.000+ Fun Puzzles
games.description: Play over 100.000 puzzles grouped into thousands and thousands of puzzle collections! There will never be a lack of puzzles for you to solve! From the main screen, select a collection and then a puzzle to play!

games.name: Emoji Mahjong
games.description: It's time to give mahjong a fresh perspective! Prepare to play a classic game that has been played by millions of people! You can now play Emoji Mahjong!

games.name: Solitaire Story Tripeaks
games.description: Tri-Peaks is a solitaire game that blends pyramid solitaire and golf! It's time to go to exotic locations, wonder at breathtaking scenery, and visit famous landmarks while playing your favorite card game! Solitaire Story Tripeaks is now available to play!

games.name: Kings and Queens Solitaire Tripeaks
games.description: Come explore a majestic realm in Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks!

games.name: Garden Tales
games.description: It's another busy day in Garden Tales! Meet a bunch of fun gnomes in this magical online game and collect flowers, fruit, and mushrooms in over 700 exciting levels!

games.name: 10x10 Gems Deluxe
games.description: Can you master 10x10 Gems Deluxe? Find out how long you can keep playing this challenging online game.

games.name: Kitty Scramble
games.description: This cunning cat has a pretty impressive vocabulary. Join him in this fun series of spelling challenges in Kitty Scramble!

games.name: Microsoft Solitaire Collection
games.description: You can play not just one, but five different classic card games at Microsoft Solitaire Collection!

games.name: Rachel Holmes: Find Differences
games.description: There are a lot of things hidden right under your nose in Rachel Holmes Find Differences. Are you ready to find them all?

games.name: Sugar Heroes
games.description: It was just another summer day when a mysterious meteor appeared in the sky of this small town. Join a group of brave cakes and candies as they embark on an adventure that's out of this world in Sugar Heroes!

games.name: Circus Words
games.description: Respectable audience! Come be a part of the show in Circus Words! This is an intense game that mixes puzzles and spelling!

games.name: Microsoft Bubble
games.description: It's time to pop Microsoft Bubble! How fast will you be able to clear the board?

games.name: Heroes of Match 3
games.description: A new threat has just arrived on the shores of this enchanted realm! Defend it at any cost in Heroes of Match 3!

games.name: Microsoft Mahjong
games.description: Microsoft Mahjong is the classic tile-matching game now updated with Daily Challenges, a new look and feel, and over 40 puzzles! Enjoy gorgeous graphics and relaxing sounds with multiple visual themes to choose from.

shortDesc.en: Microsoft Mahjong is the classic tile-matching game now updated with Daily Challenges, a new look and feel, and over 40 puzzles!
shortDesc.no: Microsoft Mahjong er en nyere versjon av det klassiske brettspillet som inkluderer daglige utfordringer, et helt nytt utseende, og over 40 puslespill!
shortDesc.tr: Mahjong oyunlarını sever misin? Bir de Microsoft Mahjong'u denemelisin! Taşları eşle ve tüm alanı temizle!

games.name: Microsoft Jewel
games.description: How fast can you connect the shiny jewels into Microsoft Jewel?

games.name: Microsoft Jigsaw
games.description: There are over 2,000 puzzles for you to try out in Microsoft Jigsaw!

games.name: Word Sauce
games.description: Chloe is fixing her grandfather's coffee in Word Sauce Free Word Connect Puzzle. Can you help her get the establishment back to its former glory?

games.name: Crocword Crossword Puzzle Game
games.description: You've never solved crosswords like this! Fill all the spaces in Crocword Crossword Puzzle Game!

games.name: Microsoft Sudoku
games.description: It's time to work with some numbers! How fast can you complete these puzzles in Microsoft Sudoku?

games.name: Solitaire Classic
games.description: Match the cards as fast as you can in Solitaire Classic. Can you master this online version of the much loved game?

games.name: Candy Riddles
games.description:
Enjoy Candy Riddles - the sweetest match 3 puzzle! Cute cookies and colorful candies with fun animations will certainly get you hooked!
Jam through challenging levels matching scrumptious combos and collect great prizes!
Connect delicious ice creams, pop cupcakes, match three pleasant characters in our addictive match3 game!

games.name: Jewel Miner
games.description: There are tons of gems to collect in Jewel Miner! Will you be able to catch them quickly in this challenging online game?

games.name: Merge Fish
games.description: It's time to go to the lake in Merge Fish. Don't forget the fishing rod in this challenging online game!

games.name: Super Bubble Shooter
games.description: You will be able to visit various unique places in this challenging online game. Where will you end up in Super Bubble Shooter? Let's jump into it and find out!

games.name: Jungle Match
games.description: In Jungle Match, it is time to feel the beat of the jungle drum! This game captivates you in the Amazon rain forest's wild beauty. In over 1000 levels, you'll combine and collect exotic fruits and flowers. Are you ready to jump into the wild forests? Have fun!

games.name: Yummy Tales
games.description: There are many hungry animals waiting for you in this charming farm. Can you match various tasty fruits and vegetables for them in Yummy Tales?

games.name: Mahjong Dimensions
games.description: Tired of the typical 2D matching game? Mahjongg Dimensions literally adds a dimension of fun to your match-making experience. Play Mahjongg Dimensions, match-making with a “TWIST”!

games.name: Ludo Hero
games.description:
Ludo Hero, modern version of the royal game of Pachisi has arrived. It's a game which was played among Indian kings and queens in ancient times.

Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other opponents and become the king of Ludo in this multiplayer game.

No complicated login screens. Just enter your username and play against the world.

Play with your friends in a 2-player or 4-player mode.

games.name: Mahjong Link
games.description: In Mahjong Link you must match two identical Mahjong blocks. A block has to be free on at least one side. It's a very relaxing and simple game to play. Each mahjong tile in this link game is numbered to identify the tiles more easily.

games.name: Mahjongg Alchemy
games.description: A classic puzzle for all ages with an addicting new look!

games.name: 3D Rubik
games.description: Play this  awesome 3D Rubiks ame, put your brain to work! It will make you feel super satisfied once you crack it! Double click to start, you can swipe left or right on a single cube on all sides. Will you be able to beat the game? This game is playable on all devices.

games.name: Block Champ
games.description: Block Champ is a puzzle game that resembles other 10x10 classics, but with a few twists! Fill rows and columns with blocks to clear them – but watch out for frozen tiles, which require their line to be cleared twice before they disappear. Lightning tiles are there to help you, though! Collecting two in one line clears that line immediately. Your score multiplier increases with each simultaneous line clear, so combine your line fills for a high score!

games.name: Blocks
games.description: This is Blocks!

games.name: Bubble Shooter Extreme
games.description: Bubble Shooter Extreme is a WebGL/HTML5 version of popular Bubble Shooter game with great graphics. Additionally, the game is unusual because it is quite complex, but anyone who is skilled in computer games will surely be able to play it until the end of the game. Shoot two or more connected bubbles of the same color to disappear them. The more bubbles you disappear in one shot the more score you get. Game is won after all bubbles exploded.

games.name: Bubble Shooter Halloween Special
games.description: Get ready for some scary fun in Bubble Shooter Halloween Special. How fast can you pop all the bubbles in this Halloween game?

games.name: Bubble Shooter Pro 2020
games.description: Welcome to the most fun bubble shooter game in the world,Blast all the colorful balloons, and test your strategy and logic skills solving fun puzzles.Can you pop bubbles like a pro? If so, you’ll be able to prove it with this challenging bubble shooter game. It’ll rate your skills while you play each exciting level.

games.name: Climb the Ladder
games.description: Do you want to climb the ladder? The ladder here is unusual! He has infinite height! The possibilities are endless. You need quick reflexes to have more combos. They can also consistently get higher grades. Mind the ladder is not very secure! Catch the beat and change hands!

games.name: Dream Pet Link
games.description: In Dream Pet Link you must connect identical tiles to each other to clear the board. It features cute animals such as lions, penguins, or sheeps. Play through all the nine levels of the game and make the best use of the limited time to match the identical tiles to make them disappear.

games.name: Emoji Puzzle!
games.description: A new imagination game in which you need to connect pairs of emotions by associations. Think and find the idea of each puzzle. Just tap one by one on the elements from different columns to connect them with a line. Or drag to draw a line and connect elements from different columns. If you correctly connect all the elements, you pass the level. Harder than you think!

games.name: Fruit Connect
games.description: Connect all the fruit pieces in this fun connect-2 game. Click on an image to make a connection.

games.name: Happy Glass Puzzles 2
games.description: The happy glass returns for a second round of puzzles. Complete all of the puzzles to unlock all skins and water colors in this fun online puzzle game. Three different modes to master.

games.name: Jigsaw Puzzle
games.description: Meet cute animals, visit unknown places, or get to see new things. Experience all of this while playing comfortably on your phone. Choose the difficulty that suits your own pace and finish every jigsaw puzzle.

games.name: Kris Mahjong
games.description: Connect the mahjong pieces in Kris Mahjong. Clear the board by removing all pairs of identical tiles

games.name: KrisMas Mahjong
games.description:
Krismas Mahjong is a Christmas Version of Kris Mahjong. A very popular Mahjong game. 
Connect the mahjong pieces in KrisMas Mahjong. Clear the board by removing all pairs of identical tiles

games.name: Love Pins
games.description: This should be a happy day because this couple of lovers will have a date. But there is a problem now, so many roadblocks on their road. Use the tools to kill bad guys and help them to meet their lover. Use your brain to solve these problems. Can you help them to meet each other? Have a try in the Love Pins!

games.name: Mahjong Shanghai Dynasty
games.description: Enjoy a classic mahjong game with a Shanghai Dynasty theme. Connect pairs and clear the board.

games.name: Mahjong Titans
games.description: Combine two of the same mahjong stones to play them off the field. Enjoy this classic!

games.name: Match Arena
games.description: Match Arena Game - First PvP Match 3 Against Real Players!Step in the Arena! World’s first Match 3 against real players.Test your strategy and skill against real opponents or connect with friends in live Match 3 action on hundreds of levels with unique settings, gorgeous effects and unexpected turns.Play and climb to the Golden League of Match Arena by completing exciting challenges on your way up! Let the cutest piggy-magic accompany you in your exciting and challenging journey.

games.name: Pet Connect
games.description: Pet Connect is a fun connect-2 game with pets. Clear the board by removing all pairs of identical tiles

games.name: Rope Slash 2
games.description: This is one of the most interesting and challenging rope cutting arcade puzzle game you can ever find out there. Use your finger to cut the rope and release the ball. Smash all cans to complete a level!

games.name: Spider Solitaire 2
games.description: Stack the cards from King to Ace in this classic Spider Solitaire game.

games.name: Tetris
games.description: lay rounds of tetris in this classic Tetris game.

games.name: Tic Tac Toe Paper Note
games.description: You may have played many Tic-Tac-Toe game until now. But, probably, you haven't played such a entertaining Tic-Tac-Toe game which you will play soon. If you wonder why is that, keep reading, here is few info about this Tic-Tac-Toe game. There is a game that you will play like you are playing in real world, waiting for you. Game sounds and effects make this game superior. If you are ready, let's begin!

games.name: Tiles of the Unexpected
games.description: In Tiles of the Unexpected you must click on groups of 2 or more of the same tiles. Bombs will blast tiles away.

games.name: Treasures of the Mystic Sea
games.description: A classic match 3 game with an underwater pirate setting.

games.name: Woodturning Art
games.description: Try your hand at the most satisfying wood turning game and experience the real feeling of being a carpenter. This wood crafting art game gives you a chance to cut, polish and paint the wood crafted objects.You can polish and color the woods you shape.

body.name: Sand Sort Puzzle
body.description: You must tap on the glasses to pour the same-colored sand into separate glasses and sort them in Sand Sort Puzzle. A flower will grow on a glass if you fill it with one hue. Have fun!

body.name: Microsoft Sudoku
body.description: It's time to work with some numbers! How fast can you complete these puzzles in Microsoft Sudoku?

body.name: Amazing Sudoku
body.description: Discover Amazing Sudoku! Can you put all the numbers in the right places?

body.name: Shapes Sudoku
body.description: Now is the time to play a classic game! This time it's all about the shapes! Look for the shapes that aren't there! Let's see if you're up for the challenge or not! Have fun!

body.name: Sudoku Classic
body.description: It's time to play some of your old favorites again! Are you feeling bored at home? Do you ever feel as if you're doing the same things over and over? So, that's all there is to it! Play Sudoku Classic right now!

body.name: Love Pins
body.description: This should be a happy day because this couple of lovers will have a date. But there is a problem now, so many roadblocks on their road. Use the tools to kill bad guys and help them to meet their lover. Use your brain to solve these problems. Can you help them to meet each other? Have a try in the Love Pins!

body.name: Sudoku Village
body.description: Do you want to relax with a relaxing puzzle? Play the Sudoku Village game to improve your logical reasoning skills. Relaxing music will help you unwind, while high-quality images will motivate you to concentrate more! Have fun!

body.name: Mahjong Shanghai Dynasty
body.description: Enjoy a classic mahjong game with a Shanghai Dynasty theme. Connect pairs and clear the board.

body.name: KrisMas Mahjong
body.description:
Krismas Mahjong is a Christmas Version of Kris Mahjong. A very popular Mahjong game. 
Connect the mahjong pieces in KrisMas Mahjong. Clear the board by removing all pairs of identical tiles

body.name: Mahjong Link
body.description: In Mahjong Link you must match two identical Mahjong blocks. A block has to be free on at least one side. It's a very relaxing and simple game to play. Each mahjong tile in this link game is numbered to identify the tiles more easily.

body.name: Microsoft Mahjong
body.description: Microsoft Mahjong is the classic tile-matching game now updated with Daily Challenges, a new look and feel, and over 40 puzzles! Enjoy gorgeous graphics and relaxing sounds with multiple visual themes to choose from.

shortDesc.en: Microsoft Mahjong is the classic tile-matching game now updated with Daily Challenges, a new look and feel, and over 40 puzzles!
shortDesc.no: Microsoft Mahjong er en nyere versjon av det klassiske brettspillet som inkluderer daglige utfordringer, et helt nytt utseende, og over 40 puslespill!
shortDesc.tr: Mahjong oyunlarını sever misin? Bir de Microsoft Mahjong'u denemelisin! Taşları eşle ve tüm alanı temizle!

body.name: Impostor
body.description: A spaceship is travelling in endless space, and its crew is trying to survive. There is an impostor among them and they need to stay on guard. They need to be aware of empty rooms, and be ready for an attack when left alone with someone else, what if that someone is the impostor.
